column1: Little Goat Diner////The four of us were able to be seated at the communal table right away. Our table had nearly every seat full
column2: but there was plenty of space for the 3 or 4 parties occupying the space. Our waitress was super friendly and helpful with our orders
column3: and we got our food fairly quickly
column4: although not all meals were brought out at the same time.
